New Records: India's second highest innings total in T20Is (297 for 6), surpassing its previous best T20I score of 260 for 6 against Sri Lanka in Indore in 2017
Sanju Samson's 47-ball 111 is the second-fastest T20I century by an Indian
Key Match Events: Sanju Samson and Suryakumar Yadav's 173-run second-wicket stand off 70 deliveries
Riyan Parag and Hardik Pandya's explosive batting display
Parvez Hossain Emon's dismissal off the first ball of the Bangladesh reply
Pre-Game Insights: No pre-match insights provided in the article
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match reflections provided in the article
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 24,000-odd spectators at the Rajiv Gandhi International Cricket Stadium got their money's worth as Samson and Suryakumar lit up the night with a blazing batting display
Others: Bangladesh had a complete meltdown in the 18th over, when ‘keeper Litton Das lobbed a throw over the bowler’s head when both batters were stranded at one end
